code: @Test public void testRoutes() throws Exception {     // JMX tests dont work well on AIX CI servers (hangs them)     if (isPlatform("aix")) {         return.     }     MBeanServer mbeanServer = getMBeanServer().     Set<ObjectName> set = mbeanServer.queryNames(new ObjectName("*:type=routes,*"), null).     assertEquals(2, set.size()).     Set<String> uris = new HashSet<>().     for (ObjectName on : set) {         String uri = (String) mbeanServer.getAttribute(on, "EndpointUri").         uris.add(uri).     }     // the route has this starting endpoint uri     assertTrue(uris.contains("direct://start")).     assertTrue(uris.contains("direct://foo")). }
@Override public void configure() throws Exception {     from("direct:start").to("log:foo").to("mock:result").     from("direct:foo").to("mock:foo"). }

@Override protected RouteBuilder createRouteBuilder() throws Exception {     return new RouteBuilder() {          @Override         public void configure() throws Exception {             from("direct:start").to("log:foo").to("mock:result").             from("direct:foo").to("mock:foo").         }     }. }
